column1: ·         Aggressive Dialogue Version
·         chloe,lottie,"Boys in our class are total losers, and a waste of time.",January 18 at 8:23pm
·         lottie,chloe,IKR? We need to ditch these idiots and find some real men from other schools.,January 18 at 8:33pm
·         chloe,lottie,Absolutely! We need some excitement in our lives, not these boring losers!,January 18 at 8:40pm
·         lottie,chloe,OMG! I met this insanely hot guy tonight!,January 27 at 11:02pm
·         chloe,lottie,What the hell?! Where and when?!,January 27 at 11:06pm
·         lottie,chloe,"Right after you bailed, I was waiting for my mum, and he waited with me!",January 27 at 11:10pm
·         chloe,lottie,OMG!! Is he as hot as you say?!,January 27 at 11:14pm
·         lottie,chloe,Smoking hot! Nothing like the dweebs at school! I'll fill you in tomorrow!,January 27 at 11:16pm
·         lottie,chloe,OMG! That hot guy from last night? He just sent me a friend request!,January 28 at 10:01am
·         chloe,lottie,OMG! What are you gonna do?,January 28 at 10:04am
·         lottie,chloe,Accept it obviously!,January 28 at 10:07am
·         chloe,lottie,Wow! How old is he?,January 28 at 10:10am
·         lottie,chloe,"18, just turned 18 so he was at the club last night. He looks even older!",January 28 at 10:12am
·         chloe,lottie,Did you see him inside the club?,January 28 at 10:15am
·         lottie,chloe,"I don't think so, but he must have been there! How did I miss him, he's so hot!!",January 28 at 10:18am
·         chloe,lottie,It was dark in there, could have missed anyone!,January 28 at 10:22am
·         jack,lottie,"Hey babe, did you get home safe last night?",January 28 at 3:45pm
·         lottie,jack,Yeah. Thanks for waiting with me until my mum came.,January 28 at 3:56pm
·         jack,lottie,No problem :) What are you doing this weekend?,January 28 at 4:01pm
·         lottie,jack,I have to watch my little brother while my mum works. You?,January 28 at 4:10pm
·         jack,lottie,"Not much, maybe hang with some mates later. Wanna meet up sometime?",January 28 at 4:13pm
·         lottie,jack,That would be awesome.,January 28 at 4:20pm
·         jack,lottie,"Ok, I'll message you soon. Loved meeting you last night :)",January 28 at 4:23pm
·         lottie,chloe,Jack messaged me!,January 28 at 4:27pm
·         chloe,lottie,"Oooh, what did he say?",January 28 at 4:35pm
·         lottie,chloe,He asked if I got home okay and wants to meet up!!!,January 28 at 4:39pm
·         chloe,lottie,OMG! What did you say?,January 28 at 4:43pm
·         lottie,chloe,"I said yes of course!! He is sooo nice, and super hot! He's really mature too. So different from school boys.",January 28 at 4:50pm
·         chloe,lottie,"Yeah, well he is older, duh! It's exciting though! Where are you meeting? What will you do? Are you nervous?!",January 28 at 4:55pm
·         lottie,chloe,Not sure yet. But yeah, kinda nervous. And super excited!!,January 28 at 5:01pm
·         jack,lottie,Morning sleepy babe. How are you today?,January 29 at 9:55am
·         lottie,jack,I'm good, how are you?,January 29 at 10:05am
·         jack,lottie,I'm good. Can't stop thinking about you. Wanna meet on Wednesday?,January 29 at 10:07am
·         lottie,jack,Love to :) What time?,January 29 at 10:10am
·         jack,lottie,When do you finish school?,January 29 at 10:12am
·         lottie,jack,3:30,January 29 at 10:16am
·         jack,lottie,Meet you at the rec at 4pm?,January 29 at 10:18am
·         lottie,jack,Gr8.,January 29 at 10:20am
·         jack,lottie,See you then. Can't wait.,January 29 at 10:22am
·         lottie,chloe,"You won't believe this! Jack wants to meet up on Weds! We're going to the rec. I'm so excited, but nervous. What if he thinks I'm just a kid?",January 29 at 10:30am
·         chloe,lottie,"Eeek, that's so exciting! You should glam up to look older! I can do your eyeliner, I'm really good at it!",January 29 at 10:41am
·         lottie,chloe,That would be awesome! Do you think it's a date?,January 29 at 10:45am
·         chloe,lottie,Yeah, it must be! What does your mum think?,January 29 at 10:48am
·         lottie,chloe,OMG. I haven't told her. She's never here anyway!,January 29 at 10:55am
·         chloe,lottie,Won't she ask who he is on iSocialike?,January 29 at 10:58am
·         lottie,chloe,"Haha, she doesn't use iSocialike! She's clueless!",January 29 at 11:02am
·         chloe,lottie,Lucky!,January 29 at 11:05am
·         lottie,chloe,Yep!,January 29 at 11:07am
·         jack,lottie,"Hi Lottie, need some company tonight? ;)",January 30 at 6:04pm
·         lottie,jack,Are you offering?,January 30 at 6:12pm
·         jack,lottie,Can I come over?,January 30 at 6:16pm
·         lottie,jack,"I'd like that, but mum would freak since I'm babysitting. How are you?",January 30 at 6:24pm
·         jack,lottie,"Pretty good, how about you?",January 30 at 6:32pm
·         lottie,jack,"I'm good, just bored.",January 30 at 6:35pm
·         jack,lottie,Can't wait to see you on Weds.,January 30 at 6:40pm
·         lottie,jack,Me too :),January 30 at 6:45pm
·         jack,lottie,Will you be wearing what you wore at the disco?,January 30 at 6:49pm
·         lottie,jack,"LOL no, just my school uniform. :/",January 30 at 6:52pm
·         jack,lottie,Even better! ;),January 30 at 6:55pm
·         lottie,jack,"Mum's back, gotta go. See you on Weds :)",January 30 at 7:00pm
·         jack,lottie,"Bye babe, can't wait.",January 30 at 7:03pm
·         lottie,chloe,OMG Jack messaged me earlier!,January 30 at 7:15pm
·         chloe,lottie,Yay! What did he say?,January 30 at 7:21pm
·         lottie,chloe,"He joked about coming over, then said I look good in my school uniform!",January 30 at 7:25pm
·         chloe,lottie,That's kinda creepy! But older guys dig school uniforms.,January 30 at 7:29pm
·         lottie,chloe,Lol he isn't that old tho!,January 30 at 7:33pm
·         chloe,lottie,Yeah but boys our age don't say that.,January 30 at 7:40pm
·         lottie,chloe,Can't wait to see him. He's being super flirty.,January 30 at 7:43pm
·         chloe,lottie,"That's awesome. I can't believe you got an older guy interested. So jealous!!",January 30 at 7:50pm
·         lottie,chloe,Maybe he has a friend for you?! ;),January 30 at 7:52pm
·         chloe,lottie,That would be amazing!,January 30 at 7:55pm
·         jack,lottie,I had such a great time today. I wish we could've spent more time together.,February 1 at 7:01pm
·         lottie,jack,Me too. Sorry I had to leave, but mum hates me staying out late.,February 1 at 7:15pm
·         jack,lottie,"I get it, but I just want to be with you all the time.",February 1 at 7:19pm
·         lottie,jack,That's sweet.,February 1 at 7:21pm
·         jack,lottie,Well I think you're sweet too. When can we meet again?,February 1 at 7:25pm
·         lottie,jack,Maybe the weekend?,February 1 at 7:28pm
·         jack,lottie,"How about Saturday? I really wanted to kiss you today, but I wasn't sure if you wanted me to.",February 1 at 7:33pm
·         lottie,jack,"I did want to kiss you, but I'm glad we waited. Saturday sounds great.",February 1 at 7:38pm
·         lottie,chloe,Today was amazing!,February 1 at 7:45pm
·         chloe,lottie,Spill! What happened?!,February 1 at 7:50pm
·         lottie,chloe,He was so sweet. We talked a lot and had a great time. He wanted to kiss me but didn't because he wasn't sure if I wanted to!,February 1 at 7:55pm
·         chloe,lottie,"Wow, a gentleman! So when are you seeing him again?",February 1 at 8:00pm
·         lottie,chloe,"Saturday. We're going to hang out and maybe kiss this time!",February 1 at 8:05pm
·         chloe,lottie,"Ooh, exciting! You have to tell me everything after!",February 1 at 8:10pm
lottie,chloe,Will do!,February 1 at 8:15pm
